meanings.definition: The quality of being resolute or firm in purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her determinednesses to finish the race inspired others to push themselves.
meanings.sent2: His determinednesses to succeed in his career led him to work hard every day.
meanings.sent3: The determinednesses of the squirrel to reach the bird feeder was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The determinednesses of the waves crashing against the shore showed the relentless power of nature.
meanings.sent5: The determinednesses of the ant carrying a leaf many times its size was a true display of strength.

meanings.definition: The state of being decided or settled.
meanings.sent1: The determinednesses of the matter left no room for further discussion.
meanings.sent2: After much debate, the determinednesses of the issue finally brought closure.
meanings.sent3: The determinednesses of the cat to claim the sunny spot on the couch was comical.
meanings.sent4: The determinednesses of the sun to rise each day is a constant in our lives.
meanings.sent5: The determinednesses of the clock ticking away the seconds reminds us of the passing time.

meanings.definition: The act of making a firm decision or resolution.
meanings.sent1: Her determinednesses in choosing a college showed her commitment to her education.
meanings.sent2: The determinednesses with which he made his career choice impressed his peers.
meanings.sent3: The determinednesses of the child to eat only candy for dinner was met with a firm 'no'.
meanings.sent4: The determinednesses of the tree to grow tall and strong symbolized resilience.
meanings.sent5: The determinednesses of the detective to solve the case led to the capture of the criminal.
